chunks.text: So it's a mobile command centre.
Okay, there's all the telecoms on board.
As you can see behind you, the benefits of being in a dive team is you get a lovely crockpot meal at lunchtime
and a firm handshake from myself once the job's been done.
So we've got double up on comms back here.
So, can you breathe? A big, big, deep big, deep, deep, deep, crack, crumb. So, can you breathe?
A big, deep, deep, deep, deep, crack in now.
What you hear now is that makes it all positive pressure so no water can come in.
And all goes really bad, what we do is peel that one off and we grab this one
which always hangs them in our neck. We just chubbed in our mouth.

text: So it's a mobile command centre. Okay, there's all the telecoms on board. As you can see behind you, the benefits of being in a dive team is you get a lovely crockpot meal at lunchtime and a firm handshake from myself once the job's been done. So we've got double up on comms back here. Oh yeah, yeah, crop pot. So, can you breathe? A big, big, deep big, deep, deep, deep, crack, crumb. So, can you breathe? A big, deep, deep, deep, deep, crack in now. What you hear now is that makes it all positive pressure so no water can come in. It's come up. Yeah. And all goes really bad, what we do is peel that one off and we grab this one which always hangs them in our neck. We just chubbed in our mouth.
